footer.description: Master Excel with AI-powered guidance and comprehensive skill directory.

hero.title: Master Excel with
hero.description: Comprehensive skills directory, interactive courses, and an intelligent chatbot to help you excel at Excel.

features.title: Everything You Need to Master Excel

skillsDirectory.title: Skills Directory
skillsDirectory.description: Comprehensive catalog of Excel skills from beginner to advanced, organized by category and difficulty.

courses.title: Interactive Courses
courses.description: Step-by-step courses designed to build your Excel expertise with hands-on practice and real-world examples.

aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Get instant answers to your Excel questions with our intelligent chatbot powered by advanced AI.

cta.title: Ready to Level Up Your Excel Skills?
cta.description: Join thousands of professionals mastering Excel with our comprehensive platform.

skills.title: Excel Skills Directory
skills.description: Browse our comprehensive collection of Excel skills. From beginner fundamentals to advanced techniques.

cta.title: Need Help with a Specific Skill?
cta.description: Ask our AI assistant for personalized guidance and instant answers to your Excel questions.

vlookup.title: VLOOKUP
vlookup.description: Search for a value in the first column of a range and return a value in the same row from another column.

pivotTables.title: Pivot Tables
pivotTables.description: Create dynamic summary tables to analyze and explore your data interactively.

conditionalFormatting.title: Conditional Formatting
conditionalFormatting.description: Apply formatting to cells based on their values to highlight important information.

indexMatch.title: INDEX-MATCH
indexMatch.description: A more flexible alternative to VLOOKUP for looking up values in any direction.

powerQuery.title: Power Query
powerQuery.description: Connect to, combine, and refine data from multiple sources.

charts.title: Charts & Graphs
charts.description: Visualize your data with various chart types for better insights.

sumif.title: SUMIF & SUMIFS
sumif.description: Sum values based on one or multiple criteria.

dataValidation.title: Data Validation
dataValidation.description: Control what data can be entered into cells to maintain data quality.

macros.title: Macros & VBA
macros.description: Automate repetitive tasks with recorded macros and VBA programming.

courses.title: Excel Courses
courses.description: Structured learning paths to take you from Excel novice to expert. Learn at your own pace with hands-on practice.

cta.title: Not Sure Where to Start?
cta.description: Our AI assistant can help you choose the right course based on your current skill level and learning goals.

fundamentals.title: Excel Fundamentals
fundamentals.description: Start your Excel journey with the basics. Learn navigation, data entry, simple formulas, and formatting.

formulas.title: Mastering Formulas & Functions
formulas.description: Deep dive into Excel formulas including VLOOKUP, INDEX-MATCH, SUMIF, and more advanced functions.

dataAnalysis.title: Data Analysis with Excel
dataAnalysis.description: Learn to analyze data with pivot tables, charts, conditional formatting, and statistical functions.

powerQuery.title: Power Query & Power Pivot
powerQuery.description: Transform and model your data with Power Query and Power Pivot for advanced analytics.

dashboard.title: Dashboard & Reporting
dashboard.description: Create professional dashboards and reports with advanced charting and visualization techniques.

vba.title: VBA & Automation
vba.description: Automate repetitive tasks and create custom solutions with VBA programming.

chat.title: Excel AI Assistant
chat.description: Ask questions, get formulas, learn techniques, and solve Excel problems instantly.
chat.keyboardHint: Press Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line
chat.greeting: Hello! I'm your Excel AI assistant. Ask me anything about Excel formulas, functions, data analysis, or best practices. How can I help you today?
chat.placeholderResponse: This is a placeholder response. The AI chatbot backend with payment integration will be implemented in the next phase. For now, you can explore the UI and see how the chat interface works.

banner.title: Placeholder Mode
banner.description: This is a UI preview. Full AI functionality with backend integration and payment system will be implemented in the next phase.
